workclass.description: The type of employer the individual has (ex: private, self-employed, government)

value_dict.Private: Individual works for a private employer
value_dict.State-gov: Individual works for the state government
value_dict.Self-emp-not-inc: Individual is self-employed but not incorporated
value_dict.Federal-gov: Individual works for the federal government
value_dict.Local-gov: Individual works for the local government

fnlwgt.description: Final weight. The number of units in the target population that the responding unit represents

education.description: The highest level of education achieved by the individual

educational-num.description: The highest level of education achieved in numerical form

value_dict.Married-civ-spouse: Individual is married to a civilian spouse
value_dict.Married-spouse-absent: Individual is married but spouse is absent
value_dict.Married-AF-spouse: Individual is married to an Armed Forces spouse

occupation.description: The general category of the individual’s employment

relationship.description: What this individual is relative to others. For example, husband, wife

value_dict.Not-in-family: Individual is not in a family
value_dict.Other-relative: Individual is a relative other than child or spouse

value_dict.Asian-Pac-Islander: Individual is Asian or Pacific Islander
value_dict.Amer-Indian-Eskimo: Individual is American Indian or Eskimo

hours-per-week.description: The number of hours the individual works per week

native-country.description: Country of origin for the individual

income_>50K.description: Whether the person makes more than 50,000 a year

value_dict.1: Individual earns more than 50,000 a year
value_dict.0: Individual earns 50,000 a year or less

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in financial and demographic data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the demographic and financial features of the individual, please predict if the individual earns more than 50,000 a year.
prompt.answer_prompt: Does the individual earn more than 50,000 a year? Yes[1] or No[0]?

class_value_dict.1: Individual earns more than 50,000 a year
class_value_dict.0: Individual earns 50,000 a year or less
